pros:
Working at Rhodes Wellness College has been such a great experience and a lot of fun! I have received incredible support and encouragement from the entire leadership team and feel like they want their team to be successful. They are truly invested in their people.

I absolutely LOVE the work I get to do every single day and really appreciate the opportunities for growth within my role and within the organization as a whole. The entire community is like a family and I have felt highly valued since day one. I cannot say enough good things about my time at Rhodes!
cons: Nothing I can think of right now.

review_title: I would call this place my HOME instead my  job
pros:
I been working at Rhodes for about one year, and I can say this is the first place where I found a truly supportive and caring community, where they care about you and see you not just as an employee,. This is a place where everyone is treat it the same way, with the same respect, and everyone has a voice, and can share an opinion. 
Management, and all the staff live with the motto "Leave no soldier behind", this means when someone of us is passing through a difficult situation not matter if related with work or personal, everyone is there to give the support, love and advice needed. 
I find myself surrounded by people that is competent, reliable, hard working, and high ethical standards which is the thing I love the most about Rhodes.
cons: I have found any so far

review_title: A Positive Environment to Work In!
pros: When you work for Rhodes you are working with a community of caring people. The schedule is flexible and they do not micromanage you as they trust their employees. Most importantly everyone is there for each other and always willing to help uplift one another! I have made such great friends through this job and I'm happy to be a part of the Rhodes family!
cons: Not that I can think of at this time

review_title: Best Place I have ever worked
pros:
This college has been the best organization I have ever worked for...and I have worked many places lol. Rhodes goes over and above for every single student as they deserve. I have witnessed with my own eyes how much love and care that is dedicated to each individual student. The students there are not treated as a "number." They are treated as a human being and are seen and witnessed as that. I have so many experiences I could share of seeing humanity hard at work.

This organization is about inner growth and building ourselves. I can say with 100% confidence that the Mission Statement for Rhodes Wellness College is consistent in all departments of the school. I absolutely LOVE the culture there and feel blessed to be a part of this organization. The impact it has on humanity is so beautiful!

Rhodes provides a supportive and collaborative work environment. I work with folks that are genuine and passionate about helping people improve the quality of their lives. I love a dynamic workplace and to see this wonderful school grow and evolve.
cons: Time off can be challenging for Instructors due to back to back semester starting times.

review_title: This school is my happy place!! It's where I love to be!
pros:
Both our students and employees are taken care of with a very definitive kind of love, care and concern, that I have not experienced in other work places.
Students and staff are listened to, taken heed of and allowed to grow within a flexible and fulfilling environment, where the word 'we is used more often than 'me'.

cons: Offers nothing of value, certificate training by unqualifed former students. This school is a scam.
